name: uma-platform
description: UMA - B2B Marketing Platform with ONDC Mobility Fulfillment

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:apps
scripts.setup:apps: cd apps/business-app && npm install && cd ../rider-app && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/business-app && npm run build && cd ../rider-app && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:apps: cd apps/business-app && npm test && cd ../rider-app && npm test
